events.name: Iraq War Invasion
events.description: US-led invasion of Iraq without UN Security Council approval
events.polling_evidence: France favorability dropped to 31%, Germany to historic lows, UK 58%

events.name: Abu Ghraib Scandal
events.description: Public revelation of torture and abuse of Iraqi prisoners by US military personnel
events.polling_evidence: Further deterioration of US image in Europe and Middle East

events.name: Guantanamo Bay Detention Facility Opened
events.description: First detainees arrived at Guantanamo Bay detention camp
events.polling_evidence: Ongoing symbol of US human rights violations

events.name: Snowden NSA Revelations
events.description: Edward Snowden revealed NSA mass surveillance programs including spying on allies
events.polling_evidence: Widespread disapproval in Germany, calls for digital sovereignty

events.name: Guatemalan Coup d'État
events.description: CIA-backed overthrow of democratically elected President Jacobo Árbenz
events.polling_evidence: Decades of civil war, foundational anti-American sentiment in Central America

events.name: Chilean Coup d'État
events.description: US-backed military coup ousting President Salvador Allende
events.polling_evidence: Primary example in anti-American rhetoric across Latin America

events.name: Nicaragua Contra War
events.description: US backing of Contra rebels against Sandinista government, Iran-Contra scandal
events.polling_evidence: Civilian deaths, destabilization, drug trafficking linkages

events.name: Afghanistan Withdrawal
events.description: Chaotic US military withdrawal from Afghanistan after 20 years
events.polling_evidence: Questions about US reliability, humanitarian crisis

events.name: Kabul Drone Strike (Civilian Casualties)
events.description: US drone strike killed 10 Afghan civilians including 7 children, erroneously believed to be ISIS-K

events.name: Gaza War - US Support for Israel
events.description: Unwavering US diplomatic and military support for Israel during Gaza conflict
events.polling_evidence: Net Israel favorability dropped 18.5 points in 42/43 countries, US seen as complicit
events.google_trends: Spike in 'Gaza genocide' and 'US Israel' searches

events.name: Travel Ban (Muslim Ban)
events.description: Executive order banning travel from several Muslim-majority countries
events.polling_evidence: Sharp decline in US favorability in Muslim-majority nations

events.name: Border Wall Executive Order
events.description: Executive order for construction of border wall with Mexico

events.name: Paris Climate Accord Withdrawal
events.description: US withdrew from the Paris Agreement on climate change
events.polling_evidence: Decline in European trust of US leadership on global issues

events.name: Biden Inauguration
events.description: Transition from Trump to Biden administration
events.polling_evidence: Median 75% confidence in Biden vs 17% for Trump in 12 nations, 40+ point swing

events.name: Ukraine War Support
events.description: Strong US support for Ukraine following Russian invasion
events.polling_evidence: Poland favorability reached 93% in 2023, highest ever
